topic.title: Initial Grid Dialog Box for Footprint Projects

para.text: Initial Grid Dialog Box for Footprint Projects

With a Footprint project, the user specifies the dimensions of the grid (the number of columns and rows) and the cell size. The user must also specify the X and Y coordinates of the grid origin. The grid origin is the location of the node in the first column and row. Columns are numbered from left to right. Rows are numbered from back to front. Thus the grid origin is the node at the left-, back- corner of the grid. The grid angle must also be specified. The angle is measured in degrees counterclockwise from the X-axis.
The user may choose not to define the grid by clicking the
button. The user will then need to
para.link: specify the rest of the grid
